main event: Two glowing, deep red objects appeared in the sky, headed towards the moon, with one displaying a flash of brilliant white light before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., The objects appeared to be three times as long as the moon's diameter., The witness claimed the objects had gravitational control., The objects moved with terrific velocity and immediate acceleration., It was reported that the sighting might have been attributed to an overactive imagination, but the witness insisted on the legitimacy of their experience.
witness description: The witness described themselves as being in full possession of their senses during the sighting and emphasized the clarity of their observation.
